info.name: Classic Theme Options Window v2 tweaks
info.description: Changes appearance of elements of Options window v2 provided by Classic Theme Restorer. Makes all top elements of pages/tabs on the same line. Hides some spaces and separators that the windows height would be smaller. Adds classic appearance of some elements and also some fixes.
info.additionalInfo: Every feedback is appreciated, tell me if you like it ;p. Post me also if something will work wrong.
